commit message: Screwed up version code
Strong references in ETD listener, replaced SQLite junk with simple JSON file, annotation conversion
Boarded departure service now restarts with intent info (so the notification doesn't randomly 'freeze')
Reordering of favorites list
Departure listing adapts to screen size
Increment version number
Fixed quick lookup
Increment version number
Always get cached boarded departure when processing an alarm (no matter how old)
Upgraded HoloEverywhere. Moved dependencies into submodules.
Add platform info to departures listing
Start action mode immediately after selecting a train
Decluttered action menus a bit. Added feature to send arrival time message.
Added XML to list of supported REST response content types
Increment version number
Added arrival time to data shown in favorites listing
Move files to Android Studio's standard file structure
Get building with Gradle and Android Studio
Add comments to gradle build files.
Remove unused gradle wrapper for nineoldandroids
Let the manifest specify the minimum and target sdk versions and app version. Use the same compile sdk version as the Eclipse setup did.
Make order of gradle files consistent

Merge pull request #4 from FuegoFro/migrate_to_android_studio

Migrate the project to Android Studio and Gradle
Death to tabs! Long live spaces!

Remove old third party shims for backwards compatibility, and replace them with the corresponding material support libraries. Has a number of visual issues, but these can be corrected in a subsequent diff to keep this self-contained.
Finish converting from tabs to spaces and remove more old eclipse files.

Merge pull request #5 from FuegoFro/material_libraries

Replace 3rd party shims with Google's support libraries

Reorganize the your_train and departure_listing layouts (and corresponding custom views) for easier editing, greater flexibility for different screens, and to fix a layout bug that was introduced when updating the libraries where the 'Your Train' section would be too wide.
General code cleanup, warnings fixes, and readability improvements.

Merge pull request #6 from FuegoFro/clean_up_your_train_view

Reorganize train info views and general code cleanup
Memoize train destination color
Remove email link

* Drop support for Android versions < 4.0
* Convert all http client to use OkHttp
* Use Android number picker instead of third party lib

New app icon (thanks to Victor Stuber)!
Add a bunch of higher res action icons.
Add featured graphic for Play Store (again, thanks Victor!)
Center empty favorites message. Give it some padding.
Bump app version and build tools.
